answers.answer: hello I had gestational diabetes too and I worked with my diabetes specialist to give me a meal plan and I beat it after I had my son the dr. tested my blood a couple of times and my sugars were all normal. I can help you if you want me too I still have all of my meal plans and what I ate for my cheat days or cravings :)
Yes, would like you to help me I am very worried, for my baby boy i am 28 weeks

Meal plans aren't the same for everyone. I was diagnosed at 17 weeks with GD and also saw a specialist... its not all that bad. Just drink lots of water, watch your portions and your carbohydrates! Good luck to you :)

question: I haven't seen my Dr yet until Friday am worried because they barely told me todayAny idea how I need to eat?!
title: pregnant and diagnosed with diabetes
